title: mecha kingdom pass
body:
Please explain...
Got the pass got all milestones sitting on 1.75 k tokens..
so now i have to grind MORE until 2k for garen chrome and that's it then ?
4 tokens for loss 8 for win ..like max ~70 games more ??

paying, still grinding and then only getting one mayor item ?
WTF rito ? ..wtf
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Math not your strength...
not buying into it again...
greedy F grade math students
